boardgame.description: Each player controls colored mice and tries to collect pieces of cheese in Castle Appenzell. On their turn, players spend action points to put new mice into play, reveal corridors in the castle, move their mice around the castle, or push a tile into play, which changes the maze of cheese pieces underneath. If two of a single player's mice reach a place with the same kind of cheese showing, the player obtains a piece of this cheese. The first player with 4 different pieces of cheese wins the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Boardgame Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. CHATEAU ROGUEFORT: $28.95 Rio Grande Games [RIO 337] SHIPPING Continental U.S. - FedEx: $10.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - USPS Priority Mail: TBD

Rio Grande Games (RIO 337) Type: Memory Number of players: 2-4 Age of players: 6+ Length: 30 minutes Game Description: Monsieur de Montforte no longer lives in his Chateau. When he vacated the premises, the highly acclaimed gourmet left behind a collection of the finest cheeses in the world. As the years passed, the cheese aged, but so did the Chateau. Now the mice that search the Chateau for the cheese treasures must be careful or fall into holes which have opened in the floors as the building aged, making the Chateau one of the largest mouse traps under the starlit sky.Welcome to the craziest Chateau in the gaming world! The three-dimensional adventure takes place on four levels. At the top, the Chateau’s roof blocks the view of the inside. When a player peeks under the roof, he can see the lattice of walls and rooms and send his mice in search of treasure – cheese! However, once there, the mice must tread carefully as the floors slide unexpectedly under their paws and can reveal a deadly trap. For those who can avoid the traps, delicious cheese treasures await.Not only can children shine in Chateau Roquefort with their unbeatable memories, but they improve also their abilities to anticipate what lies ahead! Adults will also find the game an exciting challenge, again and again! it And the game comes with a two-sided board for TWO DIFFERENT SCENARIOS! Author: Bernhard Weber _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Jens- Peter Schliemann
Domestic Shipping: USPS PRIORITY MAIL with Delivery Confirmation = $9.99
Domestic Shipping, USPS PRIORITY MAIL with Delivery Confirmation = $9.99

Brand new in shrink wrap. Zoch Verlage edition, as pictured. Game completely language independent. Official english rules inside. Fantastically produced game. Your kids will be _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;entrapped_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; by it in a positive sense of the word. After all, the mice need to find the tasteful cheeses in the castle, but there are traps everywhere, moving parts, hidden passages, that your kids will have a blast searching and finding the treasures... the CHEEESE!!! High quality components, perfect for the whole family. Get this game and your kids will want to play this game again and again with you!! If it were not for three missing cheese pieces the game would count as very good condition. The missing pieces are used to keep _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;score_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;, they do not interfere with the running of the game and could easily be substituted with a token (and will not even come into play in many games). The game is a fun childrens game involving some cleverness and memory. We liked it a lot, but our main audience has grown beyond the game now. I hope you get as much fun out of it as we did. Preferred Payment Method: Direct Deposit.
